
## ddl

```sql

-- auto-generated definition
CREATE TABLE category_plan_audit (
    id                  BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    management_city_id  BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '经营城市id',
    business_group_type TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '业务分组 1-仓配品 2-非仓配品',
    category_id         BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '品类id, 目前只有三级品类id',
    parent_category_id  BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '上一级品类id, 若是二级品类, 则为本身',
    plan_date           DATE NOT NULL COMMENT '计划日期',
    audit_status        TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '审核状态 0-待审核  10-审核通过  20-审核驳回',
    before_quantity     DECIMAL(20, 6) DEFAULT 0.000000 NOT NULL COMMENT '调整前数量',
    after_quantity      DECIMAL(20, 6) DEFAULT 0.000000 NOT NULL COMMENT '调整后数量',
    sales_metric        TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '销量口径类型 1:销售 2:订货',
    create_time         DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
    update_time         DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
    operator            VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL COMMENT '操作人',
    valid               TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT '0-无效 1-有效'
) ENGINE=InnoDB COMMENT='品类计划审核表';

CREATE TABLE category_plan_day_conf (
    id                  BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    conf_type           TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '配置类型 1: RDC盖帽',
    conf_dimension      TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '配置维度 1:城市 2:二级品类 3:三级品类',
    management_city_id  BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '经营城市id',
    business_group_type TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '业务分组 1-仓配品 2-非仓配品',
    category_id         BIGINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL COMMENT '品类id',
    plan_date           DATE NOT NULL COMMENT '计划日期',
    conf_data           TEXT NULL COMMENT '配置内容 json',   
    create_time         DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
    update_time         DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
    operator            VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL COMMENT '操作人',
    valid               TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT '0-无效 1-有效'
) ENGINE=InnoDB COMMENT='品类计划天配置表';

```
